detectors.description:
RebasedSwap.getReb2OutputAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RebasedSwap.sol#233-240) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-correctedSupply = v2Supply.mul(v1Supply).div(2082412747493439) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RebasedSwap.sol#238)
	-amount.mul(correctedSupply).div(v1Supply) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RebasedSwap.sol#239)
